pages.title: Steel
pages.text: Steel is mix of iron and chrome dust, and an alternative to Diamond.$(br)Tools and armor made of this material are as durable as their diamond counterpart, but faster and stronger. However, they're not as enchantable.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)HIGH$()$(br)MINING SPEED: $(l)9$()$(br)ATTACK DAMAGE: $(l)8$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)VERY LOW
Raw Steel can be smelted into ingots either by a Furnace or a Blast Furnace. Tools and armor must be crafted using individual pieces of Steel.
